name: Delivery Drone (Ivy Juice Games, vlad3d, Linus Gärtig, Gino Georgiev)
name_original: Delivery Drone (Ivy Juice Games, vlad3d, Linus Gärtig, Gino Georgiev)
description:
How many packages can you deliver before the time runs out?

This game was created during the Mini Jame Gam #9.

WE RECOMMEND DOWNLOADING THE GAME FOR A BETTER PERFORMANCE AND ENHANCED GRAPHICS! (YOU CAN ALSO ENABLE BROWSER HARDWARE ACCELERATION)

The theme "Only One" is resembled by the simple game mechanic and one core loop.

We tried to include the special object "A chain" in the gameplay mechanic which is inspired by the game Crazy Taxi. Many packages need to be delivered after another to form a chain of points.

ESC / P - pause the game

Mouse - rotate left, right & look up, down

W, A, S, D - move

Q, E - rotate left, right

SHIFT - move down

SPACE - move up

  • Vlad
  • Linus
  • Gino
